import Header from './Header'; import Main from './Main'; import Footer from './Footer'; import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm'; import ImagePopup from './ImagePopup'; import { useState } from 'react'; import api from '../utils/Api.js'; import Card from './Card'; function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen,setIsEditProfilePopupOpen] = useState(false); const [isAddPlacePopupOpen,setisAddPlacePopupOpen] = useState(false); const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen,setisEditAvatarPopupOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedCard,setSelectedCard] = useState(false); function closeAllPopups () { setisEditAvatarPopupOpen(false); setisAddPlacePopupOpen(false); setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(false); setSelectedCard({}); } return (
setisEditAvatarPopupOpen(true)} onEditProfile ={() => setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(true)} onAddPlace={() => setisAddPlacePopupOpen(true)} onCardClick={() => setSelectedCard(true)} />
closeAllPopups(true)} >
closeAllPopups(true)} >
closeAllPopups(true)} >
{/* */} closeAllPopups(true)} />
); } export default App;
